## includes() function

지정된 값이 동일한지 확인합니다.

There is another alias function called `contains`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function includes<T extends readonly []>(
  value: unknown,
  iterable: T,
): false;
```

## Example

```ts
includes("c", "abcd"); // true
includes("e", "abcd"); // false
includes(3, [1, 2, 3, 4]); // true
includes(5, [1, 2, 3, 4]); // false
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/includes.ts)
